fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 gained 90.10 points or 0.51% to settle at 17,812.40. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, advanced 2.48% to 12.27. Reliance Industries, Divi's Laboratories and Infosys were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The April 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 27 April 2023.
